game.name: Heartlines
game.genres: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Early Access
game.shortDescription: Heartlinesis a choice-driven narrative FPS game where your decisions determine who lives, who dies. You and the all people inside of street can't leave you see an Angel in your dream and he says you need to kill the one who possessed by Satan. You have 10 day, before time runs out make your choices.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Heartlinesis a choice-driven narrative FPS game where your decisions determine who lives, who dies. You and the all people inside of street can't leave you see an Angel in your dream and he says you need to kill the one who possessed by Satan. You have 10 day, before time runs out make your choices.
